website_summaries.verdict: A smaller-size massager that lets you target specific areas.
pros: Massages through high frequency sonic vibration and heating
Heats to 104° F to improve skin's elasticity and firmness
Easy to use – just apply cream around eyes and gently massage into fine lines
cons: If you can't get the massager to vibrate, be sure your finger is touching the sensor and the wand is touching your face

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I feel like for my under eye circles I need to use this product for a while before I see the results but I got Chinese cream for eyes so hopefully it will work all together) I love the warm sensation and it’s very simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Irina S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice feeling under eyes. Heats up quickly. Great for DIY Facial Tech Fridays.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Helps My Dry Eye!
customer_reviews.text: Provides the heat+massage recommended for myobium glands! Best thing I've found for my severely dry eyes EVER.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Plesantly suprised
customer_reviews.text: I saw this exact product on Urban Outfitters for $50 and almost purchased it for that much, but luckily I have the chrome extension for amazon and a pop up came up showing this product for only $10 on Amazon. I'm so glad I went with the one on Amazon. It preforms perfectly for a fraction of the price. It truly helps my eye serum by the ordinary absorb SO MUCH faster. The warming affect is also very nice. 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Koko

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it's working, but it feels good
customer_reviews.author: limor

customer_reviews.title: Results after one use
customer_reviews.text: The night I received, I used and again in the morning. Went to work and two people asked what I did because I looked so rested and glowing. Second day, 3 different people complimented my skin (two were guys). Third day two friends pulled me aside and wanted to know what I changed in my routine because puffiness less around eyes. 4th day husband said he could really start to tell. So, see for yourself, for me it worked. Easy to use, not too hot and got results all for about $12 bucks. Been 5 days and I use twice a day and I can see results too. Getting as gifts for sisters and a few friends at Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: No apparent change
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I did not notice any change in my eye bags. I have been using this product for over 4 months now and I still have eye bags under my eyes, even with my consistent and daily use. Needless to say, I am quite disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sabby

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonders!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Works perfectly fine and is a must for my daily skin routine. I apply my moisturizer with it and it works wonders for me! Helps me look well rested in the mornings. I definitely recommend buying this
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This product isn’t only great for smoothing wrinkles, it is awesome if you have a sinus headache the heat and the vibration around your eyes is so soothing! I love this product and I bought three for my sisters and they love it! It’s also great for over your lips!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J. Franks

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: What a sleek and eminently reliable little device! It heats up very rapidly, and the galvanic-current-fueled vibratory action is really lovely. Moreover, the price is right. Brilliant on all counts!
customer_reviews.author: Lucille Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this eye massage machine, it helped to absorb eye cream as well, second day morning I still can feel my eye-bag moisture specially the temperature I love it, it's completely different compare with only use hand to put on the eye cream .Also it's very easy to use, warm temperature made my eyes very relax.It's very good staff.
customer_reviews.author: Len Bertett

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help with dry eyes it seems to be helping. Not sure if it is helping with dark under eyes but then I don't always remember to use it. It is easily held in the hand and has a gentle massage with a comforting heat. Takes a few seconds of use before it warms up. I have found that it works better when using a cream or lotion.
customer_reviews.author: max ceja

customer_reviews.title: Eye Massager is great
customer_reviews.text: I got this product for my dad because his eyes are very puffy. My dad started using it and he loves it. It works really well for his puffy eyes. This massager is also very easy to use. I recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Fiza

customer_reviews.title: i recommend you just go for it
customer_reviews.text: i've been using this, twice a day, for the last two months and i am rather impressed with the results so far. i'm even going to send one as a gift to my mom. if you haven't yet decided if you want to make the purchase, i recommend you just go for it.
customer_reviews.author: neverwhere

customer_reviews.title: Poor and expensive
customer_reviews.text: Not very efficient.Batteries drain rapidly. Make the usage very expensive After more search, find just the same at less than what I paid I do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels nice but it’s a pretty cheap gadget
customer_reviews.text: Feels nice but it’s a pretty cheap gadget. It also has a habit of going off by itself and running the battery down.
customer_reviews.author: McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Not very impressed
customer_reviews.text: it's way to small and mine doesn't Heat up so I'm returning it
customer_reviews.author: kelly clark

customer_reviews.title: refunded
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work for me, but they were good about refunding the cost. Might work for someone with less sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: nkcal

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy for undereye bags, makes them worse. But help stop sinus headaches
customer_reviews.text: This is Not for use under the eye without something to help the tip slide. Otherwise you will make bags much worse. Think it's overpriced; however, all desciptions, pkng, fast shipping -- all good. This is just not a miracle worker, I am mostly keeping because it seems to really help those horrible "sinus" pains around the temple and above eyebrow. Feels really good...and I'm pretty sure I've stopped some oncoming contractions around a Too Small sinus cavity around my left eye.
customer_reviews.author: jeannie sue

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware. I believe the reviews are not real ...
customer_reviews.text: Buyers beware. I believe the reviews are not real. I gifted this item to my sister and it stops vibrating in 2 weeks. Now it it outside US and hard to return (without paying as much as it costs).
customer_reviews.author: Engin

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This seller buying good review with money. Not recommend. Too weak.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it but I still don’t understand what’s for. Lol

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good! I need to be more consistent with ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good ! I need to be more consistent with using it to push product into skin

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work properly. The vibration is very weak ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work properly. The vibration is very weak. You don't feel the vibration, and it's not warm as showed on the website

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.text: Not only did it not do what it was sold to do, it quit working within less than a month.
customer_reviews.author: kathy roth choate

customer_reviews.title: This was not only easy to use but also seems to help smooth fine ...
customer_reviews.text: This was not only easy to use but also seems to help smooth fine lines while helping my face and hand moisturizer to absorb better. It does seem to need regular use to keep my skin healthier and smoother.
customer_reviews.author: GWEN B

customer_reviews.title: Works but not fantastic
customer_reviews.text: It did help reduce puffiness and undereye bags.... but the pics I saw on here of before and after were more dramatic results. My bags and puffiness are from insomnia. Maybe this is better on other bags.
customer_reviews.author: jess h

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't feel very warm. Would have rather the temperature be a little higher.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tried it for the first time and I love it

customer_reviews.title: hot temperature hurts
customer_reviews.text: The wand gets too hot to use on the face. I have not been able to use this product. Disappointing

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality!
customer_reviews.text: IT is BROKEN! After only one and half Month using, it is totally broken! Poor quality, Not worth the Money!

customer_reviews.title: This eye massager works really great. It glides across my eyes easy and warming ...
customer_reviews.text: This eye massager works really great. It glides across my eyes easy and warming plate really feels good.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: No good at all ! Dont waste your money !!!
customer_reviews.author: Fnu Asiyatno

customer_reviews.title: Who needs Botox when you have this little device! ...
customer_reviews.text: Who needs Botox when you have this little device!! Honestly if you have ten minutes a day morning and evening perhaps and you focus on your problem areas you will definitely see results. It is pain free cheap and formidable on little lines.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Alexopoulos

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money. product did not work as ...
customer_reviews.text: not worth the money. product did not work as advertised and stopped working after a few seconds. writing in to find out how to return this item or to get a refund. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: John A. McNeal

customer_reviews.title: I have had a bag under my left eye for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had a bag under my left eye for years. It's from allergies, I've used this with a little eye cream and after 4 days the bag is gone! The wrinkles I have aren't gone yet but I have noticed they aren't as deep as before. I'm looking forward to using this daily.
customer_reviews.author: M. Beland

customer_reviews.title: Using it for migraine pain.
customer_reviews.text: Only reason it got 4 vs 5 was it killed the single battery it took after about 6 uses. I have migraines, with really intense pain spots on my face. So I have been using this during my migraines. And wow what a difference it eases my muscle pain. I know that's not what it's intended for but it's helped me a ton. I'm sure the heat function and vibrate kills battery faster. But I do recommend it still.
customer_reviews.author: Xaviebug

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. My eye doctor told me to use warm compresses to open the glands in my eyelids to improve my tear quality. This is the easiest way to do this.
customer_reviews.author: APK

customer_reviews.title: Really like this.
customer_reviews.text: Really liking this. It smooths out the fine wrinkles. lightens the eye area, just wish someone could tell me how often and how long I should use it. I've been using it 2 or 3 times a day. I also use it on my jowels (sides of chin). No harm, no foul. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: rocknsteady

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkle device
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be helping wrinkles around the eyes, in 2 weeks use, 2x's a day, jury still out on neck.
customer_reviews.author: Meg O

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The title says it all. This product is terrible and doesn't work. The heat burns under your eyes and makes your skin worse. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do the job
customer_reviews.text: While I don't see any improvement under my eyes, the warmth of the massager feels nice.
customer_reviews.author: cardmaker

customer_reviews.title: Nice price
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use and I don’t feel any bad feelings with my facial care.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Eldred

customer_reviews.title: I have been using it for almost a month and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for almost a month and I think it works. It's not a miracle, obviously (wasn't expecting that), but If you use it everyday both puffiness and dark circles diminish.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Simon Rubio

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Got this obviously for helping eye creams penetrate the skin more deeply and help relax fatigued eyes some days. It really drags the skin around the eyes unless I use a very heavy eye serum that doesn't absorb quickly. Then you can massage away. I have also enjoyed using this Eye Massager on my jaw where I have tightness and pain at times from TMJ. It's not a cure for that or it's intended purpose, but it's helped me relieve some tension there on occasions. You just can't run it forever or it will over heat and cut off. It was not worth the Twenty Dollars I paid for it in late 2017 however.
customer_reviews.author: SweetPeaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot! If you're on the fence I say go for it
customer_reviews.author: thatsecretbooknerd

customer_reviews.title: so worth it
customer_reviews.text: Feels nice the massage it put me to sleep lol
customer_reviews.author: M.F

customer_reviews.title: So happy with the outcome
customer_reviews.text: I have a chalazian that I have been unable to treat effectively for months. This really helped shrink it and the heat helped get the tears flowing again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: I am embarrassed I wasted my money on this
customer_reviews.text: Horrible waste of money. It worked for about a minute and hasn't worked correctly since. It pulses on and off.
customer_reviews.author: krains

customer_reviews.title: ... few days but I have to say I really like it. I had a headcold which left sinus ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this a few days but I have to say I really like it. I had a headcold which left sinus swelling and that horrible sunken eye look. I used this and could see a noticeable difference on the side it was used on verses the other. It did an amazing job at reducing the swelling. I'm not 100% over the cold yet but this little thing did a lot toward making me feel better about how I look during - so I'm pretty happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Tstergirl

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.text: This item got hot very quickly; I believe it to be dangerous! Not sure how you could use it effectively. I do not recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Burke

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly it works very well. I thought it'd be a gimmick.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and feels like my eye cream really is more effective. The touch sensors do their job seamlessly, but it feels like it doesn't heat up quite as much as it did the first few times. Still very nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Hana

customer_reviews.title: Relieve eye  pressure, good massager.
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot! Use it whenever my eyes feel sore after using computer for a long time. It's small and portable and heats up quickly and doesn't burn the skin. Doesn't know anything about anti-aging effect. As far as relieving the eye pressure, it's pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Kate K

customer_reviews.title: Great when it worked
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, but after I wiped it down with a. Damp cloth like it said in the package it wouldn't shut off. Only used it one day. Disappointed. Probably my fault, but not sure why the instructions said to do it if it would cause this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: not what I expected the vibration is very light, I don't think this is doing anything
customer_reviews.author: cllow24

customer_reviews.title: OK For Eye Cosmetics Absorption
customer_reviews.text: This appliance is OK for helping your eye area absorb your cosmetic products. The vibration feels nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice device. Easy to use warms up nicely I just need to be more diligent.
customer_reviews.author: lolleyp

customer_reviews.title: Don't know if it's doing something for me. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't know if it's doing something for me. I started using it every day but didn't see any results so I ended u suing it here and there. There was no manual soI asked how long are you supposed to massage your eyes for and no response. They replied with some tips. I'll follow them all and see if I get results.
customer_reviews.author: Edith

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!
customer_reviews.text: I put a few drops of Retinol around my eyes and in between my eyebrows and then use this device to rub it in. Love the soothing vibrations and warmth while its working. Only have been using this for a week but I swear I see results already after daily use!!! PS - Retinol is the only proven wrinkle reducing product out there so this just further assists in penetrating the skin to deeper levels. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: ShopaholicTop Contributor: Pets

product_meta.title: TOUCHBeauty Portable Eye Massager Wand with 40℃ Heated & Sonic Vibration Treatment for Relieving Eyes Dark Circles,Puffiness,Fatigue| Smart Sensor Facial Anti-Aging Galvanic Device TB-1583
feature_bullets: SONIC VIBRATION EYE MASSAGER: designed to reduce the dark circle and puffiness cause of stay up or sleepless. Help to revitalize the delicate skin under the eyes, soothes and refreshes the skin for a brigter appearance.

COMBINED 40℃ WARM TREATMENT WITH SONIC VIBRATION: The Warm Treatment helps to open your pores of skin and allows eye creams to be absorbed better. The vibration helps to increase blood circulation and relax the eyes.
BEST PARTNER OF EYE CREAM: Use with our 40℃ Heat Wand, your favorite eye creams will be more effectively absorbed by your skin, give you a more radiant and healthy skin.

SMART SENSORS SWITCH: You must have your fingers contacting the (Smart Sensor) metal part on the wand, device will automatically senses contact electronically and go to work. TOUCHBeauty eye massage wand with advanced patent technology (Patent NO.201530153674.0)

SLEEK & PORTABLE DESIGN: small enough to take anywhere, perfect for traveling as it easily fits in your purse or cosmetic bag, and come with a protective cap to cover the massage head when not in use to protect them from damage
